sentence: A number of House members have been identified by planners of the “Stop the Steal” rally as having collaborated with them—either directly or via assigned staffers—including Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, Paul Gosar of Arizona, Lauren Boebert of Colorado, Mo Brooks of Alabama, Andy Biggs of Arizona, and Louie Gohmert of Texas.
author: John Nichols
title: Madison Cawthorn’s Incitement of Insurrection Should Knock Him Off the Ballot

sentence: Yet Khanna explained in no uncertain terms that “there should be de-escalation and neutrality instead of entangling the US in another war.” The response from progressives stood in stark contrast to that of truculent Democrats and Republicans in Congress, and distinguished them from isolationist conservatives in the House, such as Arizona Republican Paul Gosar, who has simply declared, “We have no dog in the Ukraine fight.” The push by these progressives for de-escalation is in tune with polling data, which suggests that Americans are unenthusiastic about moves that might draw the US military into the conflict.
author: John Nichols
title: 100 Groups Demand That Biden Stop Escalating Tensions Over Ukraine

sentence: Democrats also removed Rep. Paul Gosar, a Republican from Arizona, from his committee assignments after he posted an edited anime video showing him killing Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.
author: Yelena Dzhanova
title: Kevin McCarthy says Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff will be removed from House Intelligence Committee if GOP wins majority in midterms

sentence: Led by influential figures such as Tucker Carlson, who hosts the most widely viewed show on cable news, and politicians such as Josh Hawley, Matt Gaetz, Paul Gosar, and Marjorie Taylor Greene—many of whom have embraced outright white nationalists—this MAGA wing of the conservative movement is on the rise, and is determined to remake the GOP in its own image, including around foreign policy.
author: Tobita Chow
title: Tucker Carlson’s Flip-Flops on Russia Mask a Deep Militarism

sentence: “And there was miscommunication.” Gosar spoke to AFPAC in-person in 2021: Rep. Paul Gosar is helping Nick Fuentes recruit young conservatives to his white nationalist, Christian nationalist ideology https://t.co/1yZuAV3oq4 pic.twitter.com/8rzfAhSv5S — Right Wing Watch (@RightWingWatch) March 12, 2021 When asked about addressing the White nationalists again this year, Gosar reportedly shrugged it off.
author: Kipp Jones
title: Paul Gosar Blames ‘Miscommunication’ With Staffer For His Address to White Nationalist Nick Fuentes’ AFPAC
